summary: Staff of Chaos from The elder scrolls Arena
descriptionHtml:
Staff of Chaos from the elder scrolls arena
WARNING: the staff is located under the surface of the maze near the burnt corpse for some reason i cannot grab it and pull it up and from a closer look in the Creation Kit it shows it on top of the ground.
This is my first ever mod so don\'t expect anything Majorly good if anyone can do a reskin for it please let me know 
please endorse if you think it is good.
Now Smithable:
Skyforge the ingredients needed are: 
scroll of fireball, 
scroll of icespike,
 black soulgem, 
daedra heart, 
2firewood 

you can also just uses the ~ key and type: help chaos it should be there
This mod goes Great with the Spellbinder Armour(armor of jaguar tharn the darkelf breton guy from arena) Here\'s the Link: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21228

Location 100% in labrynthian at the maze near burnt body !tcl under the ground to find it!
texture 0%
Attributes and stats 100%
very a bit overpowered with the stats but it is what the lore says

Now added a physical copy of the staff in the maze at labrynthian and a journal relating to this

Next update will be attributes then i will go onto the big boy (the texture and or model)
 
I have postponed textureing this due to a privat message sent to me and here is the title: Skyrim: mercenary and Hireling overhaul
It will add many new hireling and mercenaries to the world of skyrim from bodyguards to rogue assassins, Pirates to sailors 

If anyone can texture this or whatnot I would be so overjoyed and I will credit you as doing 50% of the work because i believe texturing is the biggest bit
remember to ENDORSE and COMMENT!

Thank you for reading this and hope you enjoy this mod
Credits:-
Bethesda- what a great franchise and series
Hothtrooper44-For letting me use his spellbinder armor for the images
Those who download and endorse- thanks your what drives us modders to make more!
author: Gybugy

files.name: Staff of Chaos

Added effects
drain health/magick/stamina

whatever the staff of magnus originally did
textures are being started
